channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bondi facing Democratic calls to testify following report she told Trump he was in Epstein files

item.title: DOJ Launches Strike Force To Investigate Obama Team’s ‘Weaponization’ Of Russia Hoax Against Trump
item.description: A federal Strike Force is made up of teams of investigators from multiple agencies working together to take on complex cases.

item.title: House GOP move to establish new panel to probe Jan. 6
item.description: House Republicans introduced a resolution establishing a new select subcommittee to continue the investigation of the events surrounding the Jan. 6, 2...

item.title: Elon Musk wants more control of Tesla so activist investors can’t boot him—but not so much the board can’t fire him if he goes ‘crazy’
item.description: He said his ownership stake is "a major concern," noting he hoped the Tesla board addresses the issue at its annual shareholder meeting in November.

item.title: Sen. Hirono slammed after suggesting anti-DEI lawmakers doubt her trustworthiness because she is a minority
item.description: Republican Sen. Eric Schmitt slams Sen. Mazie Hirono, D-Hawaii, for suggesting that critics of DEI initiatives must inherently view her with suspicion...

item.title: Elon Musk says Tesla will start adding vehicles it doesn’t directly own into its robotaxi network next year
item.description: The Austin-based EV company is still working on taking safety drivers out of the passenger seats and expanding into new cities.

item.title: Trump says U.S. will win the race on artificial intelligence
item.description: The White House unveiled a collection of initiatives that aim to make the U.S. the world leader of artificial intelligence.

item.title: NYC Mayor Adams dings Cuomo over 'history of sabotaging Black electeds'
item.description: Mayor Eric Adams is playing the race card against former Gov. Andrew Cuomo in the New York mayoral race.

item.title: The One Big Beautiful Bill Is an Opportunity to Renew Federalism
item.description: For the first time, states have the directive and flexibility to put the truly needy first and help able-bodied adults return to the workforce.

item.title: This Left-Wing Education Juggernaut Doesn’t Deserve Federal Backing
item.description: The National Education Association’s real purpose is political. That doesn’t merit a government charter.

item.title: The CEO of Southeast Asia’s largest bank knows even her job is at risk from AI
item.description: “If I can be replaced by AI, so can everything else!”

item.title: House panel directs chairman to subpoena Bill and Hillary Clinton in Epstein probe
item.description: A House Oversight Committee panel voted to subpoena several top Democratic names in response to a Democratic motion to subpoena Epstein-related files.

item.title: Tesla misses Wall Street expectations on revenue, earnings per share in second quarter earnings
item.description: Wall Street analysts had entered the earnings season with low expectations for Tesla. It underachieved.

item.title: Sesame Street Will Still Be Open
item.description: It’s now on Netflix, and it remains available for free on PBS.

item.title: FBI Analyst On Russia Hoax: ‘Our Instructions … Were To Push This’
item.description: An analyst interviewed by House investigators about claims of Russian collusion said FBI leadership made it clear 'we were to push this.'
